brief_title: A Phase 1 Study of HRS8807 Monotherapy and in Combination With SHR6390 in Subjects With ER-Positive, HER2-Negative Metastatic or Locally Advanced Breast Cancer
brief_summary: The study is to assess safety and tolerability of HRS8807 monotherapy and in combination with SHR6390 in subjects with metastatic or locally advanced breast cancer in order to estimate the Dose-Limiting Toxicity (DLT), Maximum Tolerated Dose (MTD) and select the Recommended Phase 2 Dose (RP2D).
